Description:
The Installation Manager is responsible to lead a team of engineers and technicians on the day-to-day responsibilities ensuring all the equipment are in best operational condition in their specified area of responsibility. In addition to overseeing the day-to-day activities the incumbent will coordinate between various labor resources to ensure adherence to the timelines and budgets. Furthermore, he/she will be responsible for on site management and HSE compliance.  
 Be the infield technical expert and participate in in-field diagnosis of technical issues as they arise. 
Oversee all repairs and ensure that work is completed on time. 
Keep up to date with current installation skills & techniques. 
Delegate any Installation issues to be resolved on each shift and small projects to the right skills in the team, planning and managing effective works. 
 Support and train the installation team to provide the necessary services of installation. 
Development of the department’s operating budget and monitor expenditures
Act as the Health and Safety representative within the standards and culture of the company 
Ensure all installation meet or exceed company’s, manufacturers and installation guidelines.
Support and feedback to third party providers in the delivery of their Service Delivery Targets for company to meet agreed terms with its customers and company’s KPIs. 
Monitor and perform annual performance review for Installation staff and conducts a performance evaluation report on a periodic basis or as and when required! Skills
Skills:
Minimum of a bachelor’s degree in engineering or equivalent. 
10 years plus experience in installation and technical operations across several countries with multiple Business Units. 
Must have experience in GCC.
